28 namespace bitpit {
29 
33 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
34 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage()
35  : BasePiercedStorage(), m_nFields(1), m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
36 {
37 }
38 
44 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
45 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(std::size_t nFields)
46  : BasePiercedStorage(), m_nFields(nFields), m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
47 {
48 }
49 
56 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
57 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(std::size_t nFields, const PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel)
58  : BasePiercedStorage(), m_nFields(nFields), m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
59 {
60  setStaticKernel(kernel);
61 }
62 
70 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
71 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(std::size_t nFields, PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel, PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode syncMode)
72  : BasePiercedStorage(), m_nFields(nFields), m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
73 {
74  setDynamicKernel(kernel, syncMode);
75 }
76 
84 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
85 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(const PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t> &x, const PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel)
86  : m_nFields(x.m_nFields), m_fields(x.m_fields),
87  m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
88 {
89  KernelType kernelType = x.getKernelType();
90  switch (kernelType) {
91 
92  case KERNEL_STATIC:
93  {
94  if (kernel) {
95  setStaticKernel(kernel);
96  } else {
97  setStaticKernel(x.m_const_kernel);
98  }
99  break;
100  }
101 
102  case KERNEL_DYNAMIC:
103  {
104  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to set a dynamic kernel. The kernel received in input can be only used to set a static kernel");
105  }
106 
107  default:
108  {
109  break;
110  }
111 
112  }
113 }
114 
123 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
124 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(const PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t> &x, PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel, PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode syncMode)
125  : m_nFields(x.m_nFields), m_fields(x.m_fields),
126  m_const_kernel(nullptr), m_kernel(nullptr)
127 {
128  KernelType kernelType = x.getKernelType();
129  switch (kernelType) {
130 
131  case KERNEL_STATIC:
132  {
133  if (kernel) {
134  setStaticKernel(kernel);
135  } else {
136  setStaticKernel(x.m_const_kernel);
137  }
138  break;
139  }
140 
141  case KERNEL_DYNAMIC:
142  {
143  if (kernel) {
144  setDynamicKernel(kernel, syncMode);
145  } else {
146  setDynamicKernel(x.m_kernel, syncMode);
147  }
148  break;
149  }
150 
151  default:
152  {
153  break;
154  }
155 
156  }
157 }
158 
165 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
166 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::PiercedStorage(const PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t> &x)
167  : PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>(x, nullptr)
168 {
169 }
170 
174 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
175 PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::~PiercedStorage()
176 {
177  detachKernel();
178 }
179 
185 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
186 std::size_t PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::getFieldCount() const
187 {
188  return m_nFields;
189 }
190 
199 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
200 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::setStaticKernel(const PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel)
201 {
202  if (!kernel) {
203  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to set the kernel. Provided kernel is not valid.");
204  } else if (m_kernel != nullptr) {
205  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to set the kernel. The kernel of the storage is already set.");
206  }
207 
208  m_kernel = nullptr;
209  m_const_kernel = kernel;
210 
211  rawResize(m_const_kernel->rawSize());
212 }
213 
222 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
223 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::setDynamicKernel(PiercedKernel<id_t> *kernel, PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode syncMode)
224 {
225  // Set the static kernel
226  setStaticKernel(kernel);
227 
228  // Register the storage for dynamic synchronization
229  m_kernel = kernel;
230  m_kernel->registerSlave(this, syncMode);
231 }
232 
240 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
241 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::unsetKernel(bool release)
242 {
243  // Detach the kernel
244  detachKernel();
245 
246  // Clear the storage
247  rawClear(release);
248 }
249 
253 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
254 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::detachKernel()
255 {
256  if (!m_const_kernel) {
257  return;
258  }
259 
260  if (m_kernel) {
261  m_kernel->unregisterSlave(this);
262  m_kernel = nullptr;
263  }
264 
265  m_const_kernel = nullptr;
266 }
267 
273 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
274 const PiercedKernel<id_t> * PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::getKernel() const
275 {
276  return m_const_kernel;
277 }
278 
284 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
285 typename PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::KernelType PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::getKernelType() const
286 {
287  if (m_kernel) {
288  return KERNEL_DYNAMIC;
289  } else if (m_const_kernel) {
290  return KERNEL_STATIC;
291  } else {
292  return KERNEL_NONE;
293  }
294 }
295 
301 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
302 PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::getSyncMode() const
303 {
304  if (getKernelType() == KERNEL_NONE || getKernelType() == KERNEL_STATIC) {
305  return PiercedKernel<id_t>::SYNC_MODE_DISABLED;
306  } else {
307  return m_const_kernel->getSlaveSyncMode(this);
308  }
309 }
310 
321 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
322 std::size_t PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawSize() const
323 {
324  return (m_fields.size() / m_nFields);
325 }
326 
335 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
336 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::commitSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action)
337 {
338  switch (action.type) {
339 
340  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_CLEAR:
341  {
342  rawClear(true);
343  break;
344  }
345 
346  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_RESERVE:
347  {
348  rawReserve(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_SIZE]);
349  break;
350  }
351 
352  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_RESIZE:
353  {
354  rawResize(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_SIZE]);
355  break;
356  }
357 
358  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_SHRINK_TO_FIT:
359  {
360  rawShrinkToFit();
361  break;
362  }
363 
364  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_REORDER:
365  {
366  if (action.data && action.data->size() > 0) {
367  rawReorder(*action.data);
368  }
369  rawResize(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_SIZE]);
370  rawShrinkToFit();
371  break;
372  }
373 
374  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_APPEND:
375  {
376  // Since we are increasing the sotrage by an element at the time
377  // calling a reserve will hurt performance badly because this will
378  // prevent the automatic reallocation of the storage.
379  rawEmplaceBack();
380  break;
381  }
382 
383  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_INSERT:
384  {
385  // Since we are increasing the sotrage by an element at the time
386  // calling a reserve will hurt performance badly because this will
387  // prevent the automatic reallocation of the storage.
388  rawEmplace(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS]);
389  break;
390  }
391 
392  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_OVERWRITE:
393  {
394  break;
395  }
396 
397  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_MOVE_APPEND:
398  {
399  // Since we are increasing the sotrage by an element at the time
400  // calling a reserve will hurt performance badly because this will
401  // prevent the automatic reallocation of the storage.
402  rawPushBack(std::move(rawAt(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST])));
403  rawEmreplace(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST]);
404  break;
405  }
406 
407  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_MOVE_INSERT:
408  {
409  // Since we are increasing the sotrage by an element at the time
410  // calling a reserve will hurt performance badly because this will
411  // prevent the automatic reallocation of the storage.
412  rawInsert(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_SECOND], 1, std::move(rawAt(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST])));
413  rawEmreplace(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST]);
414  break;
415  }
416 
417  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_MOVE_OVERWRITE:
418  {
419  rawSet(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_SECOND], std::move(rawAt(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST])));
420  rawEmreplace(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST]);
421  break;
422  }
423 
424  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_PIERCE:
425  {
426  // Nothing to do. To improve performance the element will not be
427  // cleared.
428  break;
429  }
430 
431  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_SWAP:
432  {
433  rawSwap(action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_FIRST], action.info[PiercedSyncAction::INFO_POS_SECOND]);
434  break;
435  }
436 
437  case PiercedSyncAction::TYPE_NOOP:
438  {
439  break;
440  }
441 
442  default:
443  {
444  throw std::runtime_error("Undefined synchronization action.");
445  }
446 
447  }
448 }
449 
456 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
457 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawReserve(std::size_t n)
458 {
459  m_fields.reserve(m_nFields * n);
460 }
461 
471 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
472 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawShrinkToFit()
473 {
474  m_fields.shrink_to_fit();
475 }
476 
484 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
485 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawClear(bool release)
486 {
487  if (release) {
488  std::vector<value_t>().swap(m_fields);
489  } else {
490  m_fields.clear();
491  }
492 }
493 
500 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
501 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawErase(std::size_t pos, std::size_t n)
502 {
503  auto itr_begin = m_fields.begin() + pos * m_nFields;
504  auto itr_end = itr_begin + n * m_nFields;
505 
506  m_fields.erase(itr_begin, itr_end);
507 }
508 
515 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
516 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawSwap(std::size_t pos_first, std::size_t pos_second)
517 {
518  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
519  std::swap(m_fields[pos_first * m_nFields + k], m_fields[pos_second * m_nFields + k]);
520  }
521 }
522 
528 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
529 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawReorder(const std::vector<std::size_t> &permutations)
530 {
531  std::size_t storageRawSize = rawSize();
532  assert(permutations.size() == storageRawSize);
533 
534  // Evaluate the permutation of the fields
535  std::vector<std::size_t> fieldPermutations(storageRawSize * m_nFields);
536  for (std::size_t pos = 0; pos < storageRawSize; ++pos) {
537  std::size_t posOffset = pos * m_nFields;
538  std::size_t permutationOffset = permutations[pos] * m_nFields;
539  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
540  fieldPermutations[posOffset + k] = permutationOffset + k;
541  }
542  }
543 
544  // Sort the fields
545  utils::reorderVector<value_t>(fieldPermutations, m_fields, storageRawSize * m_nFields);
546 }
547 
555 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
556 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawResize(std::size_t n, const value_t &value)
557 {
558  m_fields.resize(m_nFields * n, value);
559 }
560 
567 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
568 template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedStorage<value_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type *>
569 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawInitialize(std::size_t pos, Args&&... args)
570 {
571  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
572  rawInitialize(pos, k, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
573  }
574 }
575 
583 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
584 template<typename... Args, typename std::enable_if<PiercedStorage<value_t>::template has_initialize<Args...>()>::type *>
585 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawInitialize(std::size_t pos, std::size_t k, Args&&... args)
586 {
587  rawAt(pos, k).initialize(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
588 }
589 
597 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
598 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawInsert(std::size_t pos, std::size_t n, const value_t &value)
599 {
600  m_fields.insert(m_fields.begin() + pos * m_nFields, n * m_nFields, value);
601 }
602 
608 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
609 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawPushBack(const value_t &value)
610 {
611  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
612  m_fields.push_back(value);
613  }
614 }
615 
623 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
624 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<T, bool>::value>::type *, typename... Args>
625 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEmplace(std::size_t pos, Args&&... args)
626 {
627  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
628  m_fields.emplace(m_fields.begin() + pos * m_nFields + k, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
629  }
630 }
631 
639 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
640 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, bool>::value>::type *>
641 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEmplace(std::size_t pos, bool value)
642 {
643  rawInsert(pos, 1, value);
644 }
645 
653 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
654 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<T, bool>::value>::type *, typename... Args>
655 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEmplaceBack(Args&&... args)
656 {
657  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
658  m_fields.emplace_back(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
659  }
660 }
661 
669 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
670 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<T, bool>::value>::type *>
671 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEmplaceBack(bool value)
672 {
673  rawPushBack(value);
674 }
675 
684 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
685 template<typename... Args>
686 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawEmreplace(std::size_t pos, Args&&... args)
687 {
688  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
689  m_fields[pos * m_nFields + k] = value_t(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
690  }
691 }
692 
707 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
708 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::swap(PiercedStorage &x) noexcept
709 {
710  // It is only possible to swap two storages with the same number of field.
711  // If this condition is not fulfilled we can not continue. However, we
712  // cannot throw an exception because the function is declared snoexcept.
713  if (x.getFieldCount() != getFieldCount()) {
714  std::cout << "It is only possible to swap storages with the same number of fields." << std::endl;
715  assert(false);
716  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
717  }
718 
719  PiercedSyncSlave::swap(x);
720  std::swap(x.m_nFields, m_nFields);
721  std::swap(x.m_fields, m_fields);
722  std::swap(x.m_kernel, m_kernel);
723  std::swap(x.m_const_kernel, m_const_kernel);
724 }
725 
731 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
732 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::fill(const value_t &value)
733 {
734  std::fill(m_fields.begin(), m_fields.end(), value);
735 }

744 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
745 __PS_CONST_POINTER__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::data() const
746 {
747  return m_fields.data();
748 }

757 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
758 __PS_POINTER__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::data()
759 {
760  return m_fields.data();
761 }

770 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
771 __PS_POINTER__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::data(id_t id, std::size_t offset)
772 {
773  std::size_t pos = m_const_kernel->getPos(id);
774 
775  return rawData(pos, offset);
776 }

789

802 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
803 __PS_POINTER__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawData(std::size_t pos, std::size_t offset)
804 {
805  return (data() + pos * m_nFields + offset);
806 }

819 {
820  return (data() + pos * m_nFields + offset);
821 }

831 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
832 __PS_REFERENCE__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::front(std::size_t k)
833 {
834  if (m_const_kernel->empty()) {
835  throw std::out_of_range("Vector is empty");
836  }
837 
838  return rawAt(m_const_kernel->front(), k);
839 }
840 
849 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
850 __PS_CONST_REFERENCE__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::front(std::size_t k) const
851 {
852  if (m_const_kernel->empty()) {
853  throw std::out_of_range("Vector is empty");
854  }
855 
856  return rawAt(m_const_kernel->front(), k);
857 }
858 
867 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
868 __PS_REFERENCE__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::back(std::size_t k)
869 {
870  if (m_const_kernel->empty()) {
871  throw std::out_of_range("Vector is empty");
872  }
873 
874  return rawAt(m_const_kernel->back(), k);
875 }
876 
885 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
886 __PS_CONST_REFERENCE__ PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::back(std::size_t k) const
887 {
888  if (m_const_kernel->empty()) {
889  throw std::out_of_range("Vector is empty");
890  }
891 
892  return rawAt(m_const_kernel->back(), k);
893 }

956 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
957 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::copy(id_t id, value_t *values) const
958 {
959  std::size_t pos = m_const_kernel->getPos(id);
960 
961  rawCopy(pos, getFieldCount(), 0, values);
962 }

972 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
973 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::copy(id_t id, std::size_t nFields, std::size_t offset, value_t *values) const
974 {
975  std::size_t pos = m_const_kernel->getPos(id);
976 
977  rawCopy(pos, nFields, offset, values);
978 }

986 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
987 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::set(id_t id, const value_t &value)
988 {
989  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
990  set(id, k, value);
991  }
992 }
993 
1001 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1002 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::set(id_t id, std::size_t k, const value_t &value)
1003 {
1004  std::size_t pos = m_const_kernel->getPos(id);
1005 
1006  rawSet(pos, k, value);
1007 }

1015 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1016 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::set(id_t id, const value_t *values)
1017 {

1019 
1020  rawSet(pos, getFieldCount(), 0, values);
1021 }

1089 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1090 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawCopy(std::size_t pos, std::size_t nFields, std::size_t offset, value_t *values) const
1091 {
1092  nFields = std::max(nFields, getFieldCount() - offset);
1093  for (std::size_t k = offset; k < (offset + nFields); ++k) {
1094  values[k] = m_fields[pos * m_nFields + k];
1095  }
1096 }

1105 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::rawSet(std::size_t pos, const value_t &value)
1106 {
1107  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_nFields; ++k) {
1108  rawSet(pos, k, value);
1109  }
1110 }

1354 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1355 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_pod<T>::value || PiercedStorage<T, id_t>::has_restore()>::type *>
1356 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::restore(std::istream &stream)
1357 {
1358  // Size
1359  std::size_t nElements;
1360  utils::binary::read(stream, nElements);
1361  rawResize(nElements);
1362 
1363  // Fill the storage
1364  auto fieldsBeginPos = m_nFields * m_const_kernel->m_begin_pos;
1365  auto fieldsEndPos = m_nFields * m_const_kernel->m_end_pos;
1366  for (std::size_t pos = fieldsBeginPos; pos < fieldsEndPos; ++pos) {
1367  restoreField(stream, m_fields[pos]);
1368  }
1369 }
1370 
1377 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1378 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::restoreField(std::istream &stream, std::vector<bool>::reference value)
1379 {
1380  bool bool_value;
1381  utils::binary::read(stream, bool_value);
1382  value = bool_value;
1383 }
1384 
1391 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1392 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<!PiercedStorage<T, id_t>::has_restore()>::type *>
1393 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::restoreField(std::istream &stream, T &value)
1394 {
1395  utils::binary::read(stream, value);
1396 }
1397 
1398 
1405 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1406 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<PiercedStorage<T, id_t>::has_restore()>::type *>
1407 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::restoreField(std::istream &stream, T &object)
1408 {
1409  object.restore(stream);
1410 }
1411 
1417 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1418 template<typename T, typename std::enable_if<std::is_pod<T>::value || PiercedStorage<T, id_t>::has_dump()>::type *>
1419 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::dump(std::ostream &stream) const
1420 {
1421  // Size
1422  utils::binary::write(stream, rawSize());
1423 
1424  // Fileds
1425  auto fieldsBeginPos = m_nFields * m_const_kernel->m_begin_pos;
1426  auto fieldsEndPos = m_nFields * m_const_kernel->m_end_pos;
1427  for (std::size_t pos = fieldsBeginPos; pos < fieldsEndPos; ++pos) {
1428  dumpField(stream, m_fields[pos]);
1429  }
1430 }
1431 
1438 template<typename value_t, typename id_t>
1439 void PiercedStorage<value_t, id_t>::dumpField(std::ostream &stream, std::vector<bool>::const_reference value) const
1440 {
1441  bool bool_value = value;
1442  utils::binary::write(stream, bool_value);
1443 }
